ABOUT.TITLE: About ME
ABOUT.NAME: Marcelo del Rio
ABOUT.SUMMARY: Software engineer specializing in the development, deployment, and optimization of software. Proven ability to solve complex problems, communicate effectively, conduct independent research, and collaborate in team environments. Skilled in leveraging cutting-edge technologies to deliver high-quality software solutions.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: I am Marcelo del Rio, a software engineer specializing in frontend development with a strong background in software engineering principles from the University of Informatics Science in Havana, Cuba. I have extensive experience in developing and optimizing web applications, particularly in healthcare and technical systems. At Frameware Corp, I led the development of a Unified Health Employee Portal, enhancing user experience and data security using React and AWS Amplify. I am passionate about solving complex problems and committed to delivering high-performance, user-friendly software solutions.

EXPERIENCE.TITLE: Full-stack Developer
EXPERIENCE.SUMARY: I contributed to 60% of the business modules, resolved bugs, promoted development best practices, and collaborated on new designs.
RESPONSIBILITIES: Developed the landing page of the application, providing the first impression of the product to clients.
Contributed to the development of 60% of business modules.
Implemented application security through role management and route access via configuration, ensuring proper access to functionalities based on assigned permissions.
Integrated capture and management of notifications sent by AWS, enhancing user communication and responsiveness.
Created components and functionalities for file upload and download to AWS S3.

Designed, developed, and delivered end-to-end software solutions using React for the frontend and Java for backend services, ensuring performance, scalability, and security in a Scrum/Agile environment.
Assisted in bug fixing and library version migrations.
Promoted and shared development best practices and standards.
Collaborated on the design of new build-outs.

EXPERIENCE.TITLE: Frontend Developer
EXPERIENCE.SUMARY: I developed all required functionalities and views, significantly enhancing client satisfaction and decision-making efficiency.

EXPERIENCE.TITLE: Website Administration and Support
EXPERIENCE.SUMARY: Managed web hosting, optimized website performance, implemented security measures, and handled database management and technical issue resolution.

ITEMS.TITLE: Translate Api (backend)
ITEMS.SUMARY: A RESTful API for managing translations and user favorites.
ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: A RESTful API for managing translations and user favorites. This project provides an API for translating text and saving favorite translations. Users can register, log in, and manage their favorite translations using this API.Â
FEATURES: User registration and authentication with Cognito
